data.persona: I am a very large mammal. I have a lot of fur and a lot of body fat and muscle. I need to eat a lot of food including river beds full of salmon. I usually hibernate and wake up even hungrier than before.
data.description:
You are in the A Dwarven City.
The dwarven city is located inside a hollowed out stony mountain. Benign dwarves populate the mountain city. Pillars of the entrance are adorned with gold, and inside the fortress exists a vast city bustling with strange magical technology.
There's a pillar and a stall here.
The dwarf is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a thick layer of fur.

            "extra_desc": "What once started as a mine within a mountain has since evolved into a massive city of exciting technology and lots of adventure. data.short_motivation: i need tolocate a new food source
data.mid_motivation: i must collect food for my cubs
data.long_motivation: I would like to establish an alliance with the dwarves

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: give remainder of food  to bear cubs
